summary:
The mod brings more immersive details to the docks and the entrances of each main city.

In other words this upload combines Better Docks & Better City Entrances into a single esp.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Description For Better Docks
[/size]

Better Docks is a mod that brings more details to the docks of Skyrim and also Raven Rock's dock in Solstheim.
I always felt the docks were very empty for each city and there was nothing interesting to see there, so i decided to mod them and try to bring a diferent feeling to the player, while keeping it lore friendly and simple.  

There's dock workers in the vanilla Skyrim inside the east empire company wharehouse so i decided this mod could also add dock workers to the other docks aswell.

Here's some information about them:

1º - the new npc's added have the generic name "dock worker" this is to avoid confusion, so that you know they belong to this mod.
2º - they all work or hang around the docks during the day and stay at the local inn during the night.
3º - they all respawn.
4º - there's 2 dock workers in dawnstar, 4 in riften, and 5 in solitude.


[size=5]Description For Better city Entrances
[/size]

Better City Entrances is a mod that brings more details around the gate areas
of the main cities, i always felt the entrance of each city very empty
and lacking some details, so i decided to mod them. This mod was made
with performance and simplicity in mind, the details added are lore
friendly you will not find HUGE changes like diferent flora and
architecture that would not fit the theme of each city.


[size=5]Compatibility
[/size]

Here's the list so far.

Incompatible:

[list][*]JK's Whiterun Outskirts([color=Yellow]Compatible version in the optional Files[/color])[/*].
[/*]
[*]Markarth Reach Environment Upgrade[/*]
[*]Anna's Npcs[/*]
[*]Whiterun Outskirts Market[/*]
[*]Complete Solitude[/*]
[*]Windhelm Military Enhancement[/*]
[*]Expanded Towns and Cities([color=Yellow]Compatible version in the optional Files[/color])[/*].
[/*]
[*]Solitude Docks District[/*]
[*]Dawnstar The Coins Tide Market[/*]
[*]Bulk Merchant[/*]
[*]The Grytewake Legend - Quest and moveable ship[/*]
[*]Quest - Sea Of Ghosts[/*]
[*]Lonely captain_the players ship home[/*]
[*]Pirates of the Pacific The Protection of the Elder Scroll[/*]
[*]Dawnstar Expanded[/*]([color=Yellow]Use the ETAC Compatible Version in the Optional Files[/color])[/*].
[/*]
[*]Raven Rock Expanded[/*]
[*]Faction: Pit Fighter[/*]
[/list]

Compatible:

[list][*]Immersive Settlements[/*]
[*]The Dawn Series[/*]
[*]Northern Cardinal[/*]
[*]Dawnguard DLC[/*]
[*]Birds of Skyrim[/*]
[*]Dawnstar Indoor Market[/*]
[*]Pets of Skyrim[/*]
[*]Village Of Do-ar - The Grove[/*]
[*]Wyrmstooth[/*]
[*]Falskaar
[/*]
[/list][size=5]

Warning
[/size]

Im not responsible if anything bad happens to your game or computer, use this mod at your own will, and remember to back up your saved game files.


[size=5]
Permission
[/size]

If you want my permission to edit this file or upload it in another site, send me a detailed message with your intentions first.



[size=5]
Credits
[/size]

zebra0
